CommunityMetis Retroactive Grant Program: Results & ImpactThe Metis Retroactive Grant Program provides retroactive funding to projects that have already delivered substantial value to the Metis Layer 2 ecosystem. Grants are allocated based on alignment with ecosystem goals, proven adoption and usage within Metis. This initiative, in collaboration with Gitcoin, reinforces the importance of funding builders who contribute meaningfully to decentralized ecosystems.âThe Grant Program at a GlanceTotal Distributed: 2,292 Metis tokensWinning Projects: Selected based on ecosystem impact, infrastructure development, and on-chain tractionDistribution Mechanism: Managed through Drips, enabling transparent, flexible support for open-source developmentThe evaluation process prioritized infrastructure contributions, tooling, and open-source development, ensuring that projects providing critical value to the Metis ecosystem were rewarded.Winning Projects & ContributionsThe following projects demonstrated exceptional impact, earning support from the Metis Retroactive Grant Program:Blockscout â Open-source block explorer providing transparency and essential blockchain data for Metis users and developers.Borderless Developers â Developer onboarding initiative helping Web2 developers transition into Web3 through hackathons, workshops, and advocacy.Growthepie â Public goods data platform delivering analytics and contract labeling for Ethereum scaling solutions, including Metis.Winks.fun â Twitter-integrated on-chain tool improving user engagement and adoption for Metis-based projects.Hercules â The leading decentralized exchange (DEX) on Metis, driving liquidity and seamless DeFi operations.Zapper â DeFi dashboard enabling users to track assets, transactions, and market trends across Metis and other networks.Zoth â A restaking layer for RWAs, bringing stablecoin adoption and TVL growth to Metis through ZeUSD.These projects not only contribute to Metis but also extend its reach across the broader Web3 ecosystem by fostering adoption, liquidity, and decentralized infrastructure.Funding Distribution via DripsTo ensure a transparent and flexible funding process, Drips was used to manage the distribution of grant funds.Drips is an Ethereum-based funding tool that enables contributors to support open-source projects while automatically redistributing funds based on dependency networks. This ensures that deeply embedded ecosystem tools and libraries receive continuous funding, supporting sustainable development across Web3.With Drips, Metis can efficiently fund multiple projects, allowing builders to further reinvest into the ecosystem, strengthening Metisâ decentralized infrastructure and tooling.Retroactive Funding on MetisThis grant round marks a significant step in Metisâ commitment to rewarding impactful builders through retroactive public goods funding. The collaboration with Gitcoin highlights the importance of sustainable funding mechanisms in Web3, ensuring that projects that contribute meaningfully to Metis can continue their work.As Metis evolves, future grant rounds may expand the scope and criteria, providing even more opportunities for projects to earn funding based on their contributions.For projects that were not funded this time, we encourage them to stay engaged, continue building, and apply for future funding rounds as they grow their impact within Metis.Metis remains committed to fostering an open, thriving, and developer-friendly ecosystem.Related PostCommunityMetisSwap content campaignCommunityMetis Hyperion: The Next Evolution of High-Performance Layer 2Follow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! TechnologyAlith Framework Contribution Challenge: Empowering Web3 Developers to Shape the Future of Onchain AIMetis is proud to announce a unique collaboration with LazAI and the Alith team to launch the Alith Framework Contribution Challenge, designed to empower developers passionate about building the next generation of decentralized AI applications. This initiative represents a significant step towards advancing AI innovation within the Metis ecosystem, and offers participants the opportunity to actively contribute, innovate, and earn rewards.About the ChallengeLazAI has recently opened the Alith AI Agent Framework, a sophisticated toolset built specifically for developing decentralized, blockchain-native AI agents. Alith combines powerful inference optimizations, cross-chain capabilities, and developer-friendly SDKs (Python, Rust, Node.js) to enable seamless creation and deployment of AI-powered solutions across Web3 environments.The Alith Framework Contribution Challenge invites developers to collaborate by contributing to three key areas:Code Contributions: Improve Alithâs core framework by resolving bugs, optimizing code, or enhancing existing features.âAgent Bot Development: Create innovative AI agents such as Telegram AI assistants or cross-chain bots demonstrating Alith's capabilities.âTechnical Content Creation: Develop educational resources, including tutorial videos, technical articles, or interactive demos on platforms like X (formerly Twitter), showcasing Alith usage and potential.âRewards & RecognitionA total prize pool of $1,000 worth of METIS tokens is available, distributed among participants with the most impactful and creative contributions. Selected submissions will also be highlighted across Metis and LazAI channels, offering substantial community recognition and future collaboration opportunities.Key DatesLive Workshop: Join us for an exclusive live workshop on building with the Alith agent framework on Metis L2. This interactive session will be broadcasted on YouTube and X, scheduled for Monday, March 17.Final Submission Deadline: Contributions must be submitted by Wednesday, March 19.Winners Announcement: Selected winners, decided by a dedicated review committee comprising Developer Relations representatives from Metis, LazAI, and Alith, will be announced on Wednesday, March 26.Get Started Now!Explore the Alith documentation to quickly begin developing your contributions: Alith Getting Started GuideSubmit your completed contributions through our official submission form: Contribution Submission FormHave questions or need guidance? Engage directly with the Alith developer community on Telegram: Alith Developers Telegram GroupDonât miss this opportunity to innovate at the cutting edge of Web3 and AIâjoin the Alith Framework Contribution Challenge today and help shape the decentralized future!âRelated PostTechnologyMetis Announces Strategic Partnership with OpenDeFiCommunityApril in MetisFollow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! blogs.summary: The rapid evolution of blockchain technology has brought significant improvements in scalability and efficiency, yet AI applications and gaming platforms still face a critical challengeâreal-time.
blogs.content:
Metis Hyperion: The High-Performance Layer 2 for Next-Generation AI & Web3 Applications - Metis



Year of EvolutionLearn MoreClaim Layer3 rewardsClaim hereDeveloperFor DevelopersRead documentationGet supportFor DevelopersTech WhitepaperMetis ExplorerDeveloperEcosystemJoinEcosytemDeploy your projectBecome an AdvocateApply for a JobExploreGovernanceCEGEcosystemFundingSequencerBridgeCompanyMetis L2Metis FoundationPortfolio CompaniesCompanyCommunityMoreBlogCommunityContactEventMoreExplore PlatformInfrastructureToolsExplorerForDevelopersRead documentationGet supportMetis ExplorerTech whitepaperJoinEcosystemDeploy your projectBecome an AdvocateApply for a JobGovernanceCEGMetis L2Metis FoundationPortfolio CompaniesBlogCommunityContactEventArticlesMarch 11, 2025
CommunityMetis Hyperion: The High-Performance Layer 2 for Next-Generation AI & Web3 ApplicationsIntroductionThe rapid evolution of blockchain technology has brought significant improvements in scalability and efficiency, yet AI applications and gaming platforms still face a critical challengeâreal-time, high-throughput transaction processing. Traditional Layer 2 solutions, though an improvement over Ethereumâs base layer, still struggle with congestion, centralized sequencers, and limited adaptability for AI-driven workloads.Hyperion (HYPE) is built to break through these limitations. Designed specifically for AI developers, DeFi protocols, and gaming applications, Hyperion is an ultra-fast, AI-optimized Layer 2 blockchain that eliminates the compromises of traditional rollup solutions. It introduces a high-performance modular rollup architecture, providing real-time execution, parallel processing, decentralized sequencing, and seamless Ethereum interoperability. With Hyperion, developers gain access to scalability without trade-offs, ensuring that complex applications perform at Web2-like speeds without sacrificing decentralization or security.Hyperion achieves 1-2 gigagas per second, making it one of the highest-performing Layer 2 solutions that will be available for AI engineers building in Web3.Hyperion vs. Andromeda: A Dual-Chain EcosystemHyperion is not replacing Andromeda, the existing Metis Layer 2 network, but rather expanding Metis' ecosystem with a specialized, high-performance infrastructure. While Andromeda serves as the general-purpose Layer 2 platform for Ethereum dApps, Hyperion introduces a more advanced modular rollup architecture tailored for high-frequency, AI-powered applications. This dual-chain strategy ensures that Metis can support the full spectrum of Web3 applications, offering tailored infrastructure solutions without compromise.Why Hyperion MattersLet's delve into why Hyperion is critical for the future of AI + Web3 applications and how its innovations solve fundamental issues that have long plagued Ethereum Layer 2 solutions.MetisVM: The AI-Optimized Virtual MachineAI applications require substantial computational power, and standard Ethereum Virtual Machines (EVMs) are not designed to handle the high-performance execution demands of AI models. Hyperion introduces MetisVM, a custom-built virtual machine optimized for on-chain AI inference and high-throughput dApps.How MetisVM accelerates smart contract execution:Dynamic Opcode Optimization: Smart contract execution is enhanced with dynamically optimized opcodes, reducing gas fees and improving efficiency.Speculative & Parallel Execution: AI-powered dApps can predict, precompute, and execute certain actions in parallel, greatly increasing processing speed.State-Aware Caching: Instead of fetching redundant data repeatedly, MetisVM caches frequently accessed information, ensuring faster execution times for AI and high-performance applications.Why it matters: AI developers can now run machine learning models, inference engines, and data-driven smart contracts natively on-chain, something that was previously impossible without off-chain solutions.Instant, Parallelized Transaction Processing: Hyper-ScalabilityTraditional Layer 2 solutions operate using a sequential transaction execution model, creating performance bottlenecks under high demand. Hyperion introduces a Parallel Execution Engine with an Optimistic Rollup model that enables real-time, concurrent transaction processing, a necessity for AI driven, gaming, and high-frequency DeFAI applications.Â How Hyperion achieves real-time execution:Optimistic Model: Transactions are initially assumed valid and settled quickly, with fraud-proof mechanisms ensuring network integrity.Parallel Execution Engine: Unlike traditional blockchain architectures, Hyperion allows multiple transactions and smart contracts to execute at the same time, significantly reducing delays and increasing scalability.Optimized Fraud-Proof Mechanisms: Unlike traditional Layer 2 solutions where fraud proofs can slow down execution, Hyperion optimizes fraud-checking processes, making the network both fast and secure.Why it matters: High-performance applications like on-chain AI, decentralized gaming, and real-time trading require sub-second execution times. Hyperion removes performance bottlenecks that have previously hindered Web3 innovation.MetisDB: Breaking the Blockchain Storage BottleneckBlockchain state management is a significant bottleneck for high-performance applications. MetisDB introduces an advanced storage system, enabling instant state access and cost-efficient data management.How MetisDB optimizes storage:Memory-Mapped Merkle Trees: Transactions are verified with near nanosecond-level state access, eliminating delays caused by slow storage retrieval.Multi-Version Concurrency Control (MVCC): Allows simultaneous updates to blockchain state, avoiding bottlenecks in state modifications.Asynchronous I/O Processing: Storage read/write operations are optimized in real time, ensuring transactions complete faster without unnecessary computation delays.Why it matters: AI applications demand high-speed data retrieval and storage efficiency. MetisDB ensures that Web3 AI applications can scale without being slowed down by traditional blockchain state management issues.Ethereum Settlement & Seamless Cross-Chain InteroperabilityHyperion is not an isolated blockchain, it is designed to be deeply integrated with Ethereum and the broader Web3 ecosystem. By leveraging periodic state commitments and cross-chain connectivity, Hyperion ensures that developers can build dApps that interact seamlessly across multiple networks ensuring that assets, liquidity, and data can flow freely across EVM chains.How Hyperion ensures cross-chain functionality:Optimized Ethereum Settlement: Hyperion periodically commits state changes to Ethereum, ensuring Ethereum-level security while maintaining cost efficiency. This means that all transactions on Hyperion ultimately derive security from Ethereumâs battle-tested consensus model, providing finality and immutability without excessive fees.Shared Bridge & Multi-Chain Liquidity: Hyperionâs shared bridge framework facilitates the movement of assets and liquidity across multiple EVM compatible chains. This enables developers to create cross-chain AI models, gaming economies, and DeFi applications.Â Decentralized Data & Compute Aggregation: Hyperion integrates with off-chain compute networks, allowing AI applications to access external processing power while still maintaining the integrity of on-chain execution. AI developers can deploy high-compute inference models on-chain, leveraging distributed compute providers for enhanced scalability.Why it matters: AI and gaming developers need real-time, low-cost, and high-security environments to operate effectively. Hyperion ensures that developers can settle assets securely on Ethereum, move liquidity across multiple chains, and tap into decentralized compute power, creating truly scalable Web3 applications.Resistant, Reliable, and Fair Execution: Decentralized SequencingOne of the most persistent flaws in existing Layer 2 rollups is their reliance on centralized sequencers, which introduce risks of censorship, unfair transaction ordering, and single points of failure. Hyperion eliminates these vulnerabilities by implementing a Decentralized Sequencer Network that ensures resistance, reliability, and fairness in transaction processing.How Hyperion ensures fair execution:Leader Rotation Mechanism: Instead of relying on a single entity, Hyperion rotates sequencers dynamically, ensuring that no one party controls the network or influences transaction ordering.Timeout Failover: If a sequencer node goes offline or fails to validate transactions within a specified timeframe, another sequencer immediately takes over. This eliminates downtime and ensures uninterrupted transaction flow.MEV-Resistant Ordering: By leveraging encrypted mempools and Proposer-Builder Separation (PBS), Hyperion eliminates front-running and ensures transactions are processed in the fairest possible order.Why it matters: Centralized sequencers in existing Layer 2s introduce trust assumptions that go against blockchain core principles. Hyperion ensures transactions remain censorship-resistant, unbiased, and free from manipulation, making it an ideal foundation for AI-driven automation and high-frequency financial applications. Users and developers no longer have to worry about network manipulation or censorship, making Hyperion a truly neutral execution layer.Conclusion: Hyperion - The Unstoppable Force of AI-Powered Blockchain InnovationHyperion is an evolutionary leap forward in Web3-powered AI future technology. It dismantles the traditional barriers of speed, efficiency, and decentralization, crafting an ecosystem where AI developers, DeFi innovators, and game creators can finally build without compromise. With its cutting-edge parallel execution, decentralized sequencing, and Ethereum-level security, Hyperion aims to power Web3âs future with AI.Why Hyperion changes everything:â 1-2 gigagas per second, making it one of the highest-performing Layer 2 solutions available today.â AI-Native & Gaming-Ready â Built for AI inference, machine learning, and ultra-fast gaming.Â â Ethereum-Level Security + Cross-Chain Compatibility â Fully composable with Ethereum and beyond.Hyperion will set the foundation of a new era in AI and blockchain synergy by providing the infrastructure for the most demanding applications of today and the next-gen innovations of tomorrow. If youâre creating an onchain AI driven Web3 application or high throughput DeFi ecosystem, Hyperion can serve as the chain you need for the speeds and scales necessary.Related PostCommunityMetis: Self-Sustainable By DesignCommunityCede.store Integrates Metis: Transforming Liquidity TransfersFollow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! CommunityMetis at ETHDenver 2025: A Look Back and the Road AheadIntroductionETHDenver 2025 was a defining moment for Metis, marking a significant step forward in our mission to drive innovation in Ethereum Layer 2 scalability, AI-powered blockchain applications, and decentralized execution models. As one of the largest blockchain industry events of the year, ETHDenver provided the perfect platform for Metis to reveal the future of Hyperion, the industry's first AI-native, high-performance Layer 2 network.From the highly anticipated launch of Hyperion to insightful keynotes and developer workshops, Metis took center stage in discussions on scalability, AI-driven smart contracts, parallel execution, and the evolution of decentralized AI infrastructure. Throughout the event, our team engaged with builders, investors, and industry leaders, exchanging ideas and demonstrating how Metis Hyperion redefines Ethereum's Layer 2 ecosystem.Hyperion represents the next evolution of high-performance blockchain computing, merging Ethereumâs security and decentralization with AI-driven infrastructure and advanced execution models. This recap outlines the most significant moments from ETHDenver, along with the next steps toward Hyperion Mainnet, set to launch in May 2025.Hyperion LaunchWe revealed Hyperion, introducing a modular, AI-optimized Layer 2 network designed to enhance Ethereumâs scalability and computational efficiency, specifically for computational-intensive AI protocols. Hyperion represents a major technical breakthrough, incorporating:Parallel Execution â Optimizing transaction throughput for high-performance DeFi and gaming applications.MetisVM â Enabling AI-powered smart contracts with integrated support for machine learning inference.zkML Integration â Allowing secure, privacy-preserving AI computations onchain.The introduction of Hyperion at ETHDenver attracted attention from developers at the conference who were eager to test its capabilities when it launches.Elenaâs Opening Ceremony Speech: The Dawn of Metis ReGenesisElena Sinelnikova introduced the Dual-Chain Mechanism, a novel approach that strengthens scalability, security, and AI-enhanced execution. She also outlined the core innovations that will power Metisâ next phase of growth, including:Hyperion â A next-generation L2 protocol optimized for AI-native execution and decentralized sequencing.MetisVM â A specialized virtual machine supporting AI-powered smart contracts, inference models, and zkML verification.MetisSDK â A robust development framework enabling builders to integrate AI-driven features into their applications seamlessly.LazAI & Alith â Two foundational components of Metisâ AI ecosystem, designed to provide verifiable and ethical AI functionality onchain.Elenaâs speech underscored our commitment to creating an open, scalable, and decentralized infrastructure for AI, ensuring that artificial intelligence remains transparent, verifiable, and aligned with the core values of Web3.Â Nataliaâs Keynote: ReGenesis and the AI-Optimized Future of Layer 2At the Spork Castle Stage, Natalia Ameline introduced Metis Hyperion (HYPE) and the broader Metis ReGenesis initiative. She highlighted how Hyperion addresses blockchainâs AI challenges through superior speed, scalability, and an execution environment tailored for AI applications.Her talk explored key innovations, including Hyperionâs AI-optimized infrastructure, the Dual-Chain Mechanism, and MetisVMâs integration with zkML. She emphasized how Hyperion sets new standards for AI-enabled smart contracts and decentralized intelligence.Privacy-First AI and Decentralized IntelligenceAt BUIDL Hub, Pavel Sinelnikov, DevRel at Metis L2, conducted a deep-dive workshop on Alith, a scalable privacy-first AI framework built for Hyperionâs AI-powered execution environment. The session provided developers with a technical overview of:zkVM for AI Inference â Zero-knowledge machine learning models that allow AI computations to run securely on blockchain networks.Decentralized AI Governance â How smart contracts can integrate AI-driven decision-making without centralized oversight.Optimized AI Model Deployment â Using Metis Hyperionâs MetisVM to execute AI-driven oracles, automated risk management, and AI-powered governance systems.The workshop showcased real-world AI implementations on Hyperion, demonstrating how Metisâ zkML-powered AI framework enhances security and efficiency in DeFi, DAOs, and NFT gaming applications.AI, zkML, and Hyperionâs Roadmap:At ZK Hub, LazAI CMO Daniel Kwak provided insights about LazAIâs role in ReGenesis, the Metis Hyperion roadmap, and the importance of zkML for securing AI-driven applications.His session explored:How zkML enables private, verifiable AI execution on blockchain networks.The intersection of decentralized AI and Layer 2 scalability.Hyperionâs strategy for integrating AI inference models directly into smart contracts.He (at 7:56:00) highlighted Metis Hyperion as a foundational AI infrastructure layer, bridging Ethereumâs decentralized architecture with next-generation AI applications.Key Outcome:Metis leveraged ETHDenver 2025 as an opportunity to introduce Hyperion Testnet, demonstrating how AI and blockchain can seamlessly integrate for scalability, decentralization, and intelligent automation. The Metis ecosystem spent all week engaging with developers, industry leaders, and ecosystem partners showcasing the potential of an AI-native Layer 2 solution that enhances Ethereumâs capabilities.As we move toward Hyperion Mainnet in May, we invite developers and partners to be part of this transformation. Explore Hyperion and stay connected for further updates.âRelated PostCommunityMatrix RPS Badge Contest WinnerTechnologySNZ Becomes Metis' Second Independent Decentralized Sequencer Client Follow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! EcosystemAqualis Integrates Artemis for Smarter Lending and BorrowingDecentralized finance (DeFi) continues to evolve, yet a significant challenge remains. Over $100 million in assets are locked in liquidity pools and underutilized due to inefficiencies in interoperability and collaboration. Aqualis is stepping up to solve this issue, pioneering a new era where liquidity pools seamlessly collaborate, intelligently share liquidity, and orchestrate decentralized fund transfers with unmatched efficiency.What is Aqualis?Aqualis is a next-generation lending platform designed to enhance capital efficiency in DeFi. By seamlessly integrating a decentralized exchange (DEX) with its lending protocol, Aqualis allows users to maximize their asset utility. The platform optimizes liquidity usage by dynamically reallocating excess funds into lending pools, enabling users to earn dual yield from a single deposit.Aqualis: The First Lending Protocol to Integrate Both LST and StablecoinsAqualis Protocol is the first lending protocol integrated with both Liquid Staking Tokens (LST) and stablecoins on the same platform. This innovative approach provides users with enhanced financial strategies, unlocking new ways to optimize liquidity and earning potential in the DeFi space.Introducing ArtemisArtemis has quickly established itself as a premier LST provider on Metis, allowing users to stake their assets while maintaining liquidity. This innovation ensures that users can continue to earn rewards without locking up their tokens indefinitely. The integration of Artemis with Aqualis empowers users with enhanced borrowing strategies, increased reward mechanisms, and improved capital efficiency.Why This Integration MattersWith the integration of Artemis, Aqualis enhances its lending protocol by combining LSTs with stablecoins in a single system. This advancement provides users with:Stablecoin Loans with Staking Rewards: Borrow stablecoins while still earning decentralized sequencer rewards from Artemis.Optimized Yield Strategies: Deposit stablecoins, borrow Metis, and stake on Artemis Finance to farm Art Points.Hedging Opportunities: Hedge LST positions by borrowing Metis rather than purchasing it outright.Enhanced Liquidity Efficiency: The combination of a DEX and lending protocol means that pegged assets like stablecoins and LSTs require less liquidity to operate effectively, resulting in reduced costs and higher deposit rewards.Looking Ahead: Aqualis v2Aqualis is not stopping here. The upcoming Aqualis v2 aims to further revolutionize DeFi lending with an asset multi-utilization algorithm. This new feature will allow assets to serve dual purposesâproviding trading depth and acting as collateral simultaneously. CommunityMetis Hyperion: The Next Evolution of High-Performance Layer 2IntroductionWith the first half of our technical roadmap revealed encompassing LazAI, we now introduce Metis Hyperion (HYPE), delivering on our promise of next-generation Layer 2 infrastructure and expanding our Layer 2 ecosystem. HYPE is a next-generation, high-performance Layer 2 network designed to optimize scalability, decentralization, and real-time transaction efficiency.Â Built on the Metis SDK, the core of Metis Hyperion (HYPE) is the high-performance virtual machine MetisVM, which is compatible with Ethereum and provides corresponding infrastructure support for AI applications. It offers unparalleled efficiency and performance for executing smart contracts such as DeFi, onchain gaming, and AI inference.Â MetisVM's multi-layered architecture ensures three critical elements: uncompromising security, seamless scalability, and enterprise-grade reliability. Optimizing for traditional smart contracts and AI-specific operations enables MetisVM to create the foundation that powers the Metis Hyperion ecosystem.Hyperion architecture introduces a high-throughput, low-latency architecture representing a fundamental advance in blockchain performance, enabling AI applications and complex DeFi operations that were previously impossible at scale.While Andromeda remains the foundation of Metisâ ecosystem, Hyperion (HYPE) brings a modular and adaptable rollup architecture, catering to high-frequency DeFi, gaming, and AI-driven workloads. This marks a significant evolution for Ethereum Layer 2 solutions, delivering unprecedented speed, decentralization, and interoperability.Why Metis Hyperion?Ethereum Layer 2 solutions have improved scalability, but existing rollups still face critical limitations, including centralized sequencers, network congestion, and rigid gas payment models. Hyperion directly addresses these challenges by introducing:Optimistic Rollup & Parallel Execution: Real-time transaction processing and near-instant finality.Decentralized Sequencer Network: A fair, scalable, and censorship-resistant system that optimizes AI workloads.Ethereum Settlement & Cross-Chain Interoperability: Ensuring seamless liquidity movement and compatibility with Ethereum and other blockchains.Hyperion's specialized infrastructure enables AI applications to achieve performance previously impossible on blockchain networks.Hyperion is pioneering new possibilities for a Layer 2âit is designed to be the first AI-optimized rollup, enabling AI-native computation, decentralized sequencing, and seamless cross-chain asset movement.Key TechnologyOptimistic Rollup & Parallel ExecutionHyperion integrates parallelized transaction execution with an Optimistic Rollup model, significantly increasing transaction throughput and reducing latency. The execution model employs:Block-STM-based Parallel Execution: Processes multiple transactions simultaneously, eliminating traditional bottlenecks.Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC): Reduces rollback overhead, optimizing execution efficiency.Dynamic DAG Scheduling: Ensures optimal transaction sequencing for AI and high-frequency applications.Hyperion's parallel execution architecture fundamentally transforms the economics of complex smart contract operations, particularly for data-intensive applications. By processing multiple transactions simultaneously through Block-STM and optimistic concurrency control, computing resources are utilized with unprecedented efficiency. This translates directly to lower gas costs for users. Protocols with complex calculations benefit from similar efficiencies.Â The system's dynamic DAG scheduling further optimizes resource allocation by intelligently grouping non-conflicting transactions, ensuring maximum throughput while minimizing computational waste. For developers, this cost efficiency opens new possibilities for onchain applications that would be prohibitively expensive on other networks.ââââââââââââââââDecentralized Sequencer NetworkUnlike traditional rollups that rely on centralized sequencers, Hyperion (HYPE) will move to a fully decentralized sequencer model, distributing sequencing responsibilities dynamically to prevent MEV attacks, censorship, and single points of failure.Leader Rotation Mechanism: Ensures fair, distributed sequencing to prevent monopolization.MEV-Resistant Ordering: Encrypted mempools & Proposer-Builder Separation (PBS) eliminate front-running and unfair advantages.AI Optimization: Dynamically allocates sequencer resources for AI-powered applications.Ethereum Settlement & Cross-Chain InteroperabilityHyperion remains fully secured by Ethereum while offering multi-chain connectivity:Optimized Ethereum Settlement: State commitments to Ethereum for long-term security.Shared Bridge & Cross-Chain Compatibility: Seamlessly connects assets and liquidity across multiple chains.Native Paymaster Support (Coming Soon): Allows gas payments in ETH, USDC, and USDT, lowering entry barriers for mainstream adoption.Hyperion & Andromeda: A Multi-Network FutureMetis Hyperion (HYPE) and Andromeda will coexist within the Metis ecosystem, serving distinct yet complementary roles:Andromeda: Metisâ first and most established Layer 2, optimized for general-purpose decentralized applications (DApps).Hyperion (HYPE): A high-performance, AI-native execution layer prioritizing speed, decentralized sequencing, and AI-driven workloads.This multi-network approach ensures that developers and enterprises have the flexibility to deploy applications tailored to their specific needs, benefiting from Metisâ shared Layer 2 technology.METIS Token Multi-chain UtilityThe METIS token sits at the center of the ecosystem's economic model, capturing value and maintaining utility on both Andromeda and Hyperion networks through multiple mechanisms. As the native gas token for all transactions across both chains, METIS maintains consistent demand regardless of which network users choose.Â This dual-network utility creates a unified economic system where transaction volume from AI-intensive applications on Hyperion and general DApps on Andromeda both contribute to token value. This multi-chain approach ensures that as the ecosystem expands, METIS token utility strengthens proportionally across all network activities.Long-term Ecosystem Growth and Value ExpansionMetis' dual-network strategy represents a forward-thinking approach to sustainable ecosystem growth. Rather than forcing all applications onto a one-size-fits-all solution, the complementary nature of Andromeda and Hyperion allows each to specialize while contributing to the whole. This creates natural expansion paths for projects as they evolve - starting with standard DApps on Andromeda and later incorporating AI components through Hyperion.The approach also insulates the ecosystem from market cycles by diversifying use cases across different technological domains. As general DeFi applications provide reliable baseline activity, AI applications drive innovation and new growth frontiers. A balanced, dual-network foundation creates long-term resilience while still enabling cutting-edge development.Hyperion RoadmapHyperionâs rollout follows a structured development timeline:Feb - April 2025: Testnet Launch â High-performance sequencer nodes go live.May - August 2025: Mainnet Launch â Hyperion introduces its decentralized sequencer network and high-throughput Layer 2 framework.Sept - Dec 2025: Mainnet Upgrade â Advanced execution optimizations, enabling instant feedback and parallel efficiency.ConclusionMetis Hyperion (HYPE) is redefining AI and Web3 integration, bringing Ethereum a high-performance, AI-optimized Layer 2 that enhances scalability, decentralization, and user experience. Combining parallel execution, decentralized sequencing, and Ethereum interoperability enables Hyperion to unlock the next wave of blockchain innovation.âRelated PostTechnologyTEB and B-Harvest Launch on Metis as Third External Decentralized Sequencer Node OperatorCommunityMetis Marathon Community CampaignFollow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! Itâs a seismic shift in how we interact with technology, how value is created, and how innovation is driven. At Metis, weâve always been at the forefront of progress, pushing boundaries to create scalable, decentralized ecosystems.Â As we approach the highly anticipated Denver event, Metis is excited to reveal exclusive sneak peek into our hidden roadmap. These innovations offer a glimpse into the future of blockchain and AI integration, showcasing how weâre building the ideal home for AI and redefining whatâs possible in decentralized technology.Today we bring to you one of the core features included in our hidden roadmap. Its role in our tech is just as important as all the other hidden components while being highly versatile. Without further ado, we bring you the MetisVM!The AI-Blockchain Gap: A Problem Worth SolvingAIâs explosive growth has brought incredible advancements, but it has also revealed significant gaps in infrastructure. While AI continues to transform industries, its reliance on centralized systems creates bottlenecks in scalability, transparency, and privacy. Blockchain, on the other hand, offers decentralization, security, and trustâa perfect complement to AIâs capabilities.Yet, the industry has often failed to provide AI with the technological foundation it truly needs. Many networks have rushed to embrace AI with flashy grants and hackathons, but few have addressed the core challenges of integrating AI into decentralized environments. High latency, limited throughput, and outdated infrastructure have kept AI innovation constrained within centralized silos.This is where Metis steps in. Weâre not just creating another Layer 2 solutionâweâre building the infrastructure that will empower AI to thrive in a decentralized world.Â Introducing MetisVM: The Core of Our AI-Native EcosystemAt the heart of Metisâ vision is âMetisVMâ, a high-performance virtual machine designed to bridge the gap between blockchain and AI. While compatible with Ethereum, MetisVM goes far beyond the limitations of traditional EVMs, offering features that make it the ideal foundation for AI-driven applications.Dynamic Opcode OptimizationMetisVM employs dynamic opcode optimization and Just-In-Time (JIT) compilation to reduce execution costs and boost efficiency. By analyzing smart contract bytecode in real time, MetisVM can optimize frequently-used operations, slashing execution time by up to 30%. For developers and users, this means lower Gas costs and faster transactionsâespecially for compute-heavy applications like financial derivatives and on-chain games.Speculative and Parallel ExecutionThrough speculative and parallel execution, MetisVM can process multiple transactions simultaneously, increasing throughput by over 50%. This is a game-changer for high-volume use cases like decentralized trading, where speed and scalability are critical.State-Aware CachingMetisVMâs state-aware caching intelligently stores frequently-accessed smart contract variables, reducing storage access and improving execution speed. This is particularly powerful for state-intensive applications like governance and voting in DAOs.AI Infrastructure SupportMetisVM is built with AI in mind. From inference engine optimization to hardware acceleration with GPUs and TPUs, itâs designed to handle the compute-intensive demands of AI applications. Whether itâs real-time financial modeling or on-chain AI-driven decision-making, MetisVM delivers unparalleled performance.A Glimpse Into Whatâs NextWhile we canât reveal everything just yet, Metis is on the cusp of something transformative. Our ReGenesis roadmap represents more than just incremental progressâitâs a reimagining of what blockchain can achieve when paired with cutting-edge AI infrastructure. At the heart of this vision lies decentralized sequencers, a core component that not only upholds Ethereumâs decentralized ethos but also delivers practical, real-time solutions for developers and users alike.This isnât about chasing trends or short-term hype. Itâs about creating a lasting foundation where AI and blockchain can coexist, collaborate, and thrive. MetisVM is just one piece of the puzzle, but when combined with decentralized sequencers and next-gen scalability solutions, it provides developers, builders, and visionaries with the tools they need to push boundaries and unlock new possibilities in real-world use cases.Join Us on This JourneyMetis is more than a Layer 2 solution. Itâs a vision for the futureâa future where AI and blockchain converge to create something greater than the sum of their parts. With MetisVM as the cornerstone of our ecosystem, weâre building the infrastructure that will drive the next wave of innovation.True innovation doesnât happen in isolation. It requires a community of builders, dreamers, and doers who are willing to challenge the status quo and imagine whatâs possible. At Metis, weâre not just building technologyâweâre building a movement. A movement that believes in the power of decentralization, the promise of AI, and the potential of human ingenuity.As we look ahead to Denver, weâre preparing to unveil the full scope of our groundbreaking technology. This is where vision meets execution, and where the future of blockchain and AI truly begins. Whether youâre a developer, an entrepreneur, or simply someone who believes in the transformative power of technology, thereâs a place for you in the Metis ecosystem.The future is comingâand itâs closer than you think. Stay tunedâwhatâs coming next will redefine whatâs possible. This is just the beginning.Related PostCommunityDApps Wanted!TechnologyMetis to Launch Andromeda, Honoring Our Commitment to DecentralizationFollow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! blogs.summary: Web3 has evolved rapidly over the years, introducing groundbreaking concepts that have reshaped how we think about finance, ownership, and decentralized systems.

Building the ideal Home for AI - Metis



Year of EvolutionLearn MoreClaim Layer3 rewardsClaim hereDeveloperFor DevelopersRead documentationGet supportFor DevelopersTech WhitepaperMetis ExplorerDeveloperEcosystemJoinEcosytemDeploy your projectBecome an AdvocateApply for a JobExploreGovernanceCEGEcosystemFundingSequencerBridgeCompanyMetis L2Metis FoundationPortfolio CompaniesCompanyCommunityMoreBlogCommunityContactEventMoreExplore PlatformInfrastructureToolsExplorerForDevelopersRead documentationGet supportMetis ExplorerTech whitepaperJoinEcosystemDeploy your projectBecome an AdvocateApply for a JobGovernanceCEGMetis L2Metis FoundationPortfolio CompaniesBlogCommunityContactEventNewsFebruary 17, 2025
TechnologyBuilding the ideal Home for AIHow Metis is Building the Ideal Home for AIWeb3 has evolved rapidly over the years, introducing groundbreaking concepts that have reshaped how we think about finance, ownership, and decentralized systems. The space has seen major shifts, from the early ICO boom to the rise of NFTs, DAOs, and DeFi. Each wave introduced new layers of utility, drawing attention and capital while laying the foundation for whatâs next.Â Now, another powerful wave is forming: AI. Artificial Intelligence has transcended early expectations and hype cycles, proving its ability to drive real value across almost every domain including Web3. Similar to how DeFi experienced its hype cycle during DeFi Summer, but its core principles and applications have remained foundational. AI follows a similar trajectory: beyond speculation, it delivers real-world utility across industries, streamlining operations, improving decision-making, and unlocking new possibilities for automation.AI's impact isn't limited to a single use case. Whether it's predictive analytics, natural language processing, or decentralized autonomous agents, AI has an application in almost every sector. This broad applicability makes AI a compelling force in Web3, where efficiency, automation, and scalability are crucial.So why is Metis betting on AI? Because there is a clear gap in blockchain infrastructure that is capable of supporting AI-driven applications at scale. AI thrives on data, and blockchain offers a unique opportunity to provide transparent, verifiable, and decentralized data sources. By aligning blockchain with AI, Metis is creating an ecosystem where AI projects can operate more effectively and securely, while also benefiting from the decentralized principles that Web3 offers.Moreover, the timing couldn't be better. With the U.S. easing restrictions on AI and crypto, the regulatory landscape is becoming more favorable. This opens the door for rapid development and adoption. Web3 has been searching for its next big wave, and AI could be the catalyst to bring in mainstream adoption beyond just crypto-native users. Metis recognizes this opportunity and is positioning itself at the forefront of AI-powered blockchain innovation, ensuring AI has everything it needs to scale within Web3.But recognizing the opportunity is not enough. Now, letâs dive deeper into the "why." Why is Metis taking this bold step?Â Our Strategy: Bridging the Gap in AI + CryptoThe intersection of AI and blockchain is still in its infancy, and while many blockchain projects acknowledge AIâs potential, most are missing the mark entirely. Instead of addressing the real infrastructure challenges that AI developers face, they are throwing money at the problem, hoping hype will be enough to carry them forward. This kind of strategy doesnât just fall short, it creates systemic risk, leading to unsustainable bubbles similar to the 2000 dot-com crash or the speculative DeFi boom of 2021.Where Others Are Falling ShortGrants & Hackathons â Many blockchain projects are resorting to grants and hackathons, believing that a burst of developer activity will lead to meaningful AI adoption. But this is just temporary engagement, without long-term infrastructure, these projects have nowhere to go after the funding runs dry. What happens when the incentives end? The builders leave, and the so-called AI revolution on these chains fizzles out.New AI-Focused Layer 1s â The most dangerous trend in AI+Crypto is the sudden emergence of AI-focused Layer 1 blockchains. While this may seem like a bold innovation, it is an incredibly high-risk gamble. History has shown that launching a new Layer 1 is difficult, most fail to achieve critical mass, leading to abandoned ecosystems and wasted developer effort. If these AI-specific chains fail, every project built on them is at risk. The foundation crumbles, and the entire ecosystem collapses with it.Minor Token Upgrades â Adjusting tokenomics to âincentivize AIâ without addressing fundamental technical limitations is a band-aid, not a solution. Some networks slap AI-related buzzwords onto governance models, tweak a few incentive mechanisms, and claim they are AI-ready.The result? A chaotic landscape where projects are chasing hype rather than building sustainable AI ecosystems. If this trend continues, a handful of projects may survive, but without fundamental infrastructure, the majority will struggle to gain real adoption.AI developers donât need more speculative schemes, they need robust, scalable infrastructure that allows them to deploy real applications. Very few blockchain projects are focusing on the actual computational demands of AI: high-speed processing, decentralized storage, and secure data verification.Metis understands these pitfalls and is taking a fundamentally different approach, one that goes beyond throwing money at the problem. Instead, Metis is focused on providing the infrastructure AI projects actually need to scale. This is where our two-pronged strategy comes into play.Our Commitment: A Two-Pronged ApproachMetis is not just another blockchain chasing the AI hype, we understand the real gaps in the industry, and we are building to address them. AI models are data-intensive, high-speed, and demand real-time computation. Traditional blockchains werenât built for this level of execution. Developers need an environment where their AI applications can actually run without breaking.Our approach is grounded in delivering actual utility for AI builders by focusing on two critical areas:1. Providing Infrastructure AI Developers NeedBuilding AI-native applications is about giving developers the infrastructure they actually need to scale AI on-chain. AI projects require a high-performance execution layer, reliably high throughput, and a seamless developer experience. Without these, AI simply cannot function effectively on blockchain. This is exactly what Metis provides.Â High Throughput & Low Latency: AI workloads arenât like standard Web3 applications. They require constant iteration, rapid processing, and fast decision-making. Whether it's AI-driven trading, autonomous agents executing contracts, or real-time DeFi optimizations, speed is everything. High transaction finality and low-latency execution are non-negotiable.A Stable, Reliable Network: AI-driven applications rely on consistency. Unlike human users, who can adapt to occasional congestion or high fees, AI models need a predictable and stable execution environment. If AI models experience unpredictable gas fees, downtime, or network congestion, their decision-making becomes flawed.Â Infrastructure Beyond Blockchain: AI applications require an ecosystem, not just a chain. For AI to be truly effective in Web3, developers need access to decentralized compute, storage, and indexing services. Without these services, AI developers struggle with fragmented data silos.2. Solving AIâs Hardest Problems: Data MisalignmentOne of the most pressing issues in AI today is data misalignment, the inability of AI systems to align with human values and intentions due to flawed or incomplete training data. AI models rely on supervisory signals to learn, but these signals are often corrupted or missing, leading to outputs that fail to address real-world needs or ethical considerations. This results in AI-generated misinformation, bias, and hallucinations, issues that degrade trust and limit AIâs usability in high-stakes applications.Metis, through its incubation of LazAI, is directly addressing these issues. By leveraging blockchainâs transparency and verifiability, LazAI ensures that AI models can access structured, high-quality, and decentralized data sources. This not only mitigates data misalignment but also provides an open and collaborative ecosystem where AI applications can function with greater trust and reliability.Additionally, AI projects require interoperability and ease of integration with Web3 ecosystems. Metis has developed Alith, a blockchain-native AI agent framework through LazAI, enabling AI-powered applications to seamlessly function across multiple networks. This enhances their usability, adaptability, and real-world applicability, making it easier for AI models to integrate with decentralized finance, governance, and gaming platforms.The Future of AI & MetisThe fusion of AI and blockchain is only just beginning, and the possibilities ahead are vast. The same way DeFi transitioned from a speculative experiment into an essential component of every blockchain, AI will become a native intelligence layer that powers everything from on-chain automation to real-time decision-making and beyond.But hereâs the key: AI needs a home built for it.For AI to fully integrate into Web3, it requires an environment that matches its computational needs, eliminates friction, and allows it to operate without barriers.Â Thatâs exactly what Metis is enabling.By building an ecosystem designed specifically to support AI, Metis is not just addressing the challenges of today, we are setting the foundation for the innovations of tomorrow. AI thrives when it has the right infrastructure to grow, and with Metis, AI developers are no longer constrained by network limitations, computational inefficiencies, or unreliable data sources.The future is not about forcing AI to adapt to blockchain. Itâs about giving AI the home it deserves, one where it can truly scale, explore, and redefine what is possible in the decentralized world. Metis is leading this charge, ensuring that AI isnât just another trend in Web3, but a fundamental force shaping the next era of innovation.Related PostCommunityIntroducing the Metis Business Development Bounty ProgramEcosystemMetis Expands Its Presence in South Korea with a Listing on BithumbFollow us onSubscribe to NewsletterThank you! EcosystemExplore ZeUSD a next-gen stable token on MetisWelcoming ZeUSD: Pioneering Real-World Assets on MetisWe are thrilled to announce a groundbreaking partnership between Metis and Zoth with the launch of ZeUSDâa next-generation stable token designed to bring institutional-grade stability and innovative yield opportunities to the Metis ecosystem. This collaboration represents a strategic blend of traditional finance (TradFi) and decentralized finance (DeFi), providing secure, scalable access for both institutions and retail markets. The integration of ZeUSD has already shown its impact, as evidenced by the robust growth in the Total Value Locked (TVL) within the Metis ecosystem, now boasting a circulating supply of 11.81 million tokens. This significant milestone underscores the growing DeFi opportunities emerging within the Metis ecosystem capacity to innovate and deliver value through strategic initiatives like our partnership with Zoth.The Power of CollaborationZoth is building a community-first restacking layer for the RWAFi ecosystem, blending TradFi's scalability with DeFi's innovation. Creating a permissionless layer for on-chain and off-chain RWAs, Zoth enhances access and utility within DeFi. By joining forces with Metis, Zoth has rolled out ZeUSD, a stable token backed by a diverse portfolio of Real-World Assets (RWAs), including U.S. T-Bills, ETFs, and Money Market Funds (MMFs). Leveraging these stable and reliable assets, ZeUSD enables users to mint tokens directly from Ethereum in a permissionless manner, bridging the stability of institutional assets with the capital flexibility of cryptocurrency.ZeUSD: Bridging Worlds, Unlocking OpportunitiesZeUSD is more than just a new stablecoin; it's a pivotal innovation that opens up a multitrillion-dollar market of RWAs to the DeFi community. It offers unprecedented opportunities in lending, borrowing, and liquidity pools, among other DeFi applications. EcosystemMetis x Artemis: Art-Points oMETIS Distribution Plan for Stage 1Here are the details of the Art-Points oMETIS Distribution Plan, which marks the second phase of Stage 1 in the Artemis x DSEQ Reboot Campaign. This initiative is designed to reward loyal community members, enhance user engagement, and solidify the Metis DeFi ecosystem's growth in collaboration with Artemis Finance.As a pivotal part of the Metis Decentralized Sequencer (DSEQ) Reboot program, this plan ensures that 4,000 oMETIS are allocated to Art-Points holders, recognizing their valuable contributions and ongoing support of the Artemis ecosystem.What Are Art-Points?Art-Points represent usersâ activity and contributions within the Artemis ecosystem. This innovative points system enables fair and transparent rewards based on engagement and participation. The longer users stay engaged, the higher the rewards they can earn.Art-Points oMETIS Distribution Plan: Timeline and RewardsTo begin earning Art-Points all you need to do is connect your wallet and deposit METIS directly on Artemis. Rewards will be distributed in three specific periods, with only newly earned points during each period being eligible for rewards. Hereâs how it works:Period 1: February 29, 2024 â July 4, 2024Reward Pool: 1,200 oMETISEligibility: Points earned during this period will count toward the rewards for Period 1.Example:If you sold/redeemed all of your artMETIS before July 1, you will not be eligible for Period 2 rewards.If you accumulated 100 points during this period, you will receive rewards based on your contribution to the total points pool.Period 2: July 5, 2024 â October 4, 2024Reward Pool: 1,200 oMETISEligibility: Only points earned during this period will be eligible for rewards.Example:If you sold/redeemed all of your artMETIS before July 1, you will not accrue new points and therefore will not qualify for Period 2 rewards.If you retained some artMETIS and accumulated 50 points in this period, your rewards will be proportional to those 50 points.Period 3: October 5, 2024 â January 24, 2025Reward Pool: 1,600 oMETISEligibility: Points earned during this period will count toward Period 3 rewards.Example:If you sold/redeemed all of your artMETIS before October 1, you will not qualify for rewards in this period.If you accrued 50 points during Period 3, you will receive rewards proportional to those 50 points.Please note that Art-Points are not tracked for short-term campaigns, such as the new Nitro Pool in Hercules or the Binance Web3 Wallet campaigns, which offer their own unique rewards. As a result, users participating in these campaigns are not eligible for oMETIS rewards.Why This Matters for Metis and Artemis EcosystemsThe Art-Points oMETIS Distribution Plan is a strategic effort to reward active participation and maintain strong user engagement within the Metis-Artemis ecosystem. This initiative not only recognizes the efforts of loyal users but also creates a sustainable foundation for:Enhanced Liquidity: Incentivizing long-term participation increases liquidity in the ecosystem.Community Growth: Rewards encourage both new and existing users to stay involved and continue contributing.Ecosystem Alignment: By linking rewards to real activity, we ensure that incentives align with the health and sustainability of the Metis ecosystem.How to Claim Your RewardsArt-Points holders can claim their rewards directly through the Artemis dashboard after each period ends. Remember, only points earned during the designated period will count toward rewards for that specific timeframe.Looking Ahead: Building a Stronger DeFi EcosystemAt Metis, we are committed to supporting innovative projects like Artemis Finance that center users and drive ecosystem growth. The Art-Points oMETIS Distribution Plan represents another step toward fostering a decentralized, fair, and rewarding DeFi ecosystem for all participants.Stay tuned for updates as we continue building momentum with our partners and launching new initiatives to expand the Metis DeFi and LST ecosystem.
